title: Savage eSports Looking For a High Diamond/Challenger  Jungler and Top laner!
body:
Savage eSports has been around for a few months now. We currently have a team competing in all 3 OCE tournaments (ACL, Xfire and CG).

We're seeking a High Diamond/Challenger Jungler/Top laner that is mature, serious and will actually dedicate their time to the team.

I'm not looking for players that are going to quit after a week, or give up and have a negative attitude. 

Application format:

IGN:
AGE:
RANK:
Position:
Location:
Why do you want to join:
Do you own a working mic:

Thanks for taking your time to read and apply.

replies.body:
IGN: Psyper or Problematicchode

AGE: 18

RANK: Plat 1 currently, s4 peak rank 210.

Position: Top

Location: Sydney

Why do you want to join: Looking to get back into competitive play after a break due to studies.

Do you own a working mic: Yes

IGN:  Yami no Sora

AGE: 18 

RANK: Silver 1 ( Plat 2 S4)

Position: Jungler

Location: Perth

Why do you want to join: Interested in a serious team environment were i can play to my full potential, i feel although jungling in solo q is fun and helps me improve and learn more jungles playing with a team and coms is a completely different experience and one i have done in the past and enjoyed.

Do you own a working mic: Yes

P.s - I had a bad placement series and i feel that my solo queue rank does not fully show my level of skill.

IGN: whitepumah

AGE: 21

RANK: Bronze 3

Position:  Marksman/any

Location: Sydney

Why do you want to join: I am looking for a high level team who are focused more on playing the game the way it is meant to be played and being committed enough to put lots of time into making it professionally.

Do you own a working mic: Yes

IGN: Abdul Rabdaj
AGE: 18
RANK: Diamond 5 Currently, (Challenger S4)
Position: Jungler
Location: Melborne, Australia
Why do you want to join: LFT
Do you own a working mic: Yes
